title: E57 U.S. Gun Laws
itunes:title: U.S. Gun Laws
description:
In this episode, the team discusses U.S. gun laws with "America's Government Teacher" and creator of @SharonSaysSo, Sharon McMahon.

Follow Sharon on Instagram @SharonSaysSo and go to SharonMcMahon.com to learn more.

Go to JimJefferies.com to buy tickets to Jim's upcoming tour, The Moist Tour.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
